mapper.select: SELECT product_id AS productId, name, description, price, stock, image_url AS imageUrl, created_at AS createdAt FROM products ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT product_id AS productId, name, description, price, stock, image_url AS imageUrl, created_at AS createdAt FROM products WHERE product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (name, description, price, stock, image_url, created_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{imageUrl}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, WHERE product_id = #{productId}
